definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Fundraising isn’t just about who raised or donated the most money.
sentences.chinese: 公益活动不纯粹是为了比谁筹集或捐出了最多的款额。

sentences.english: It isn't certain that large cloud provide will offer idle cycles pro-bono to grid projects.
sentences.chinese: 不确定大云提供将提供空闲周期电网项目的公益活动。

sentences.english: Yesterday, our class had a public benefit activity.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我们班进行了一场公益活动。

sentences.english: Alighting Award belongs to the public welfare activities, no need to pay the entry fee.
sentences.chinese: “阿拉丁神灯奖”纯属公益活动，无需缴纳报名费。

sentences.english: This campaign is praised as the biggest commonweal campaign in the Internet history in China.
sentences.chinese: 这次活动被誉为中国互连网史上最大的一次公益活动。

sentences.english: Contact the charity before you start the campaign.
sentences.chinese: 在你进行公益活动之前请先与慈善组织联系。

sentences.english: I wish I could help much more other people in commonweal activities.
sentences.chinese: 我还希望在公益活动中帮助更多的人。

sentences.english: The public-spirited activity is one of important paths that business enterprise undertake righteous duty in Harmonious society.
sentences.chinese: 和谐社会公益活动是企业承担道义责任主要途径之一。

definition: service to the public/public welfare undertaking/charity/social facility
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
compassion/kindness/care for others/love/CL:片[pian4]/charity (bazaar, golf day etc)/heart (the symbol ♥)
to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to donate goods (to a relief effort)/to contribute material
